description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Johannesburg, South Africa. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Johannesburg Contemporary Cool with Upscale Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Pair the high energy of Johannesburg with cosmopolitan cool when you stay at Holiday Inn Johannesburg - Rosebank, an IHG Hotel, located in the chic suburb of Rosebank just north of the city centre. Splash about in the outdoor swimming pool before heading over to Velvet restaurant for decadent dining matched with an extensive list of South African wines. For the perfect end to a night in, enjoy a glass or two on the alfresco terrace while watching the sunset.

hotels.title: Elegant Johannesburg Garden Escape with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Discover the many layers of South Africa’s diverse capital at the elegant Holiday Inn Johannesburg Sunnyside Park, an IHG Hotel. Step back in time at this stunning Victorian-style property set on four acres of lush gardens. Cool off with a dip in the sparkling swimming pool and when you start feeling peckish, head over to the gleaming Milner’s Restaurant where you can sit outside with a cold pint and a hearty meal of North African and European dishes.

hotels.vendor_name: InterContinental Johannesburg O.R. Tambo Airport Hotel
hotels.title: Johannesburg Five-Star Airport Escape with Fine-Dining Restaurant & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Where convenience and luxury meet, a stay at the InterContinental Johannesburg O.R. Tambo Airport, an IHG Hotel, guarantees you're perfectly placed for modern adventures and wild safaris. This five-star escape boasts an exceptional day spa, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and an indoor heated swimming pool. Follow the call of fine dining to Quills Restaurant and Cocktail Bar, where South African produce is the specialty and dishes can be matched with outstanding local wines.
